teststep.step: Click My Profile in left nav
teststep.result: - My Profile page is displayed - Email Address block is not masked, but has option to expand - Password is displayed and masked with option to expand - Security Question block is displayed with option to expand and Security Answer masked

teststep.result: - Messaging is displayed on page: *Note:* For your security, changing your email address will delete any saved credit card information from your online account information. - Prefilled email Address and Re-enter Email Address fields are displayed in an editable state - Opt-in checkbox is selected/de-selected based on account opt in/opt out settings in mainframe - Password and Security Question sections are visible in read-only state with option to expand

teststep.step: Modify the Email Address on the account, re-enter the new e-mail address, change the opt in selection and click Cancel
teststep.result: - Returned to My Profile page - Email address is NOT updated - Original Email address is displayed as read only with Edit link available.

teststep.result: - Opt in/Opt out is selected based on original account opt in/opt out setting on mainframe

teststep.result: - Subscribe/Unsubscribe is selected based on original opt in/out setting on mainframe

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, then Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has not been received

teststep.step: Select to edit the billing address, modify any field that will https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Notification+Emails, select Save
teststep.result: - Returned to Saved Addresses

teststep.step: Log out of account, then log in to same account on a different device, go to My Account|Saved Addresses, and modify any field for any shipping address that will https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Notification+Emails, select Save
teststep.result: - Returned to Saved Addresses

teststep.step: Log out of account, then log in to same account on a different device, go to Shipping Address in checkout, and modify any field that will https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Notification+Emails, select Save and Continue
teststep.result: - Taken to next step in checkout flow

teststep.step: Log out of account, then log in to same account on a different device, go to Billing Address in checkout, and modify any field that will https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Notification+Emails, select Save and Continue
teststep.result: - Taken to next step in checkout flow

teststep.step: Log out of account, then log in to same account on a different device, go to My Profile|Edit Security Question, enter a new Security Answer, select Update
teststep.result: - Returned to default My Profile

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, then Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the original email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated fields show Billing Address Shipping Address Security Question and/or Answer - There is no update date/timestamp

teststep.step: Enter a security Answer and an incorrect password and select update
teststep.result: - Error is displayed below password box The Password you entered does not match the password we have on record. Please try again.

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT increases by 1

teststep.step: Continue to enter invalid passwords up to the PWD_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Within the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES enter invalid password from My account > My profile > Security Questions
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT does NOT increase

teststep.step: After the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES has passed enter valid password from My account > My profile > Security Questions
teststep.result: - user is able to update security question/answer

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: -PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT is reset to 0

teststep.result: gnFreeText value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: \"gnFreeText\":\"<Searched Term>\" E.g. \"gnFreeText\":\"Jeans\"

teststep.result: - User is navigated to PDP - Breadcrumb is displayed as {color:red}Search results for: Searched Term e.g. *Search results for: Jeans

teststep.result: gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is not displayed.

teststep.result: - Products are filtered as per the selected filter

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.

teststep.step: Verify gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: 1*<Name of Filter><Option Selected> E.g. 1*SIZE_PROPORTION*Regular

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.

teststep.result: gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: 1*<Name of Filter><Option Selected> E.g. 1*SLV_LNGTH*Long-Sleeve

teststep.step: Select any color chip for the first product and click on on Add to Compare
teststep.result: Product is added to Compare widget

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage with Name LS_DATA

teststep.step: Verify gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: Product1_Page_Number*Product1_Thumbnail_Link$Product1_Color_Chip_Link E.g. 10587*wim/130448_4696_42$130448_4696_43

teststep.step: Select any color chip for the second product and click on on Add to Compare
teststep.result: Product is added to Compare widget

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: Product1_Page_Number*Product1_Thumbnail_Link$Product1_Color_Chip_Link ^Product2_Page_Number * Product2_Thumbnail_Link$Product2_Color_Chip_Link E.g. 10587*wim/130448_4696_42$130448_4696_43^52290*wim/244478_163_42$244478_163_43

teststep.result: - Compare widget is displayed at the bottom right of the page. - Products from Step 1 and 4 are displayed in Compare widget.

teststep.step: Navigate to cookies section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX cookie.
teststep.result: LLBBOX cookie is not present in cookies section of the developer toolbar.

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify the LLBBOX Key Value
teststep.result: LLBBOX Key Value is displayed in following format: Expiry Date in UNIX format;{"CountryCode":"<Value>,"City":"<Value>,"Latitude":"<Value>,"Longitude":"<Value>","ZipCode":"<Value>} E.g. exp@1498143901;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"ALBANY","Latitude":"42.6525","Longitude":"-73.7567","ZipCode":"12201"} NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Verify LLBBOX Value is preceded by Expiry date in UNIX Timestamp format.
teststep.result: Expiry date in UNIX Timestamp format is displayed prefixed to LLBOX value. E.g. exp@1498143901;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"ALBANY","Latitude":"42.6525","Longitude":"-73.7567","ZipCode":"12201"}

teststep.step: Verify LLBBOX expiry date
teststep.result: - LLBBOX expiry date is 1 year from the date it was created.

teststep.result: gnFreeText value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: \"gnFreeText\":\"<Searched Term>\" E.g. \"gnFreeText\":\"Jeans\"

teststep.result: - User is navigated to PDP - Breadcrumb is displayed as {color:red}Search results for: Searched Term e.g. *Search results for: Jeans

teststep.step: Verify gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is not displayed.

teststep.step: Verify gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: 1*<Name of Filter><Option Selected> E.g. 1*SIZE_PROPORTION*Regular

teststep.step: Verify gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage with Name LS_DATA

teststep.step: Verify gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: Product1_Page_Number*Product1_Thumbnail_Link$Product1_Color_Chip_Link E.g. 10587*wim/130448_4696_42$130448_4696_43

teststep.step: Select any color chip for the second product and click on on Add to Compare

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.

teststep.step: Verify gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: Product1_Page_Number*Product1_Thumbnail_Link$Product1_Color_Chip_Link ^Product2_Page_Number * Product2_Thumbnail_Link$Product2_Color_Chip_Link E.g. 10587*wim/130448_4696_42$130448_4696_43^52290*wim/244478_163_42$244478_163_43

teststep.step: Refresh the page and verify display of Compare widget.
teststep.result: - Compare widget is displayed at the bottom right of the page. - Products from Step 1 and 4 are displayed in Compare widget.

teststep.step: Navigate to cookies section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX cookie.
teststep.result: LLBBOX cookie is not present in cookies section of the developer toolbar.

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify the LLBBOX Key Value
teststep.result: LLBBOX Key Value is displayed in following format: Expiry Date in UNIX format;{"CountryCode":"<Value>,"City":"<Value>,"Latitude":"<Value>,"Longitude":"<Value>","ZipCode":"<Value>} E.g. exp@1498143901;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"ALBANY","Latitude":"42.6525","Longitude":"-73.7567","ZipCode":"12201"} NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Verify LLBBOX Value is preceded by Expiry date in UNIX Timestamp format.
teststep.result: Expiry date in UNIX Timestamp format is displayed prefixed to LLBOX value. E.g. exp@1498143901;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"ALBANY","Latitude":"42.6525","Longitude":"-73.7567","ZipCode":"12201"}

teststep.step: Verify LLBBOX expiry date
teststep.result: - LLBBOX expiry date is 1 year from the date it was created.

teststep.result: - odsNear value is a valid UNIX timestamp - UNIX timestamp is one month from the day location was selected in the Events Near dropdow.

teststep.step: Verify val value in the odsNear parameter
teststep.result: - ID of location selected in the Events Near dropdown is displayed against val - Refer link in the test data for the locations and their IDs

teststep.step: Enter valid email address, incorrect password, and select Log in
teststep.result: - Error is displayed Either the Login ID or Password you entered is incorrect. Passwords are case sensitive. Please note that if you previously used a user name to log in, you will need to use your email address instead (user names are no longer active on the site).

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT increases by 1

teststep.step: Continue to enter incorrect passwords up to the PWD_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Within the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES enter invalid password in Log in layer
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT does NOT increase

teststep.step: After the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES has passed enter valid email address and password on order history page
teststep.result: - user is able to login and see order history

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT is reset to 0

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: -PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT increases by 1

teststep.step: Continue to enter incorrect passwords up to the PWD_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Within the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES go to forgot password, enter the correct security question answer and continue
teststep.result: - User is presented with option to reset password

teststep.step: Enter new password and enter the same password for re-enter password. Select save changes
teststep.result: - User is logged in

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT is reset to 0

teststep.step: Enter valid email address and invalid password, select Log In
teststep.result: - Error is displayed Either the email address or password you entered is incorrect. Passwords are case sensitive. Please note that if you previously used a user name to log in, you will need to use your email address instead (user names are no longer active on the site).

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: -PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT increases by 1

teststep.step: Continue to enter incorrect passwords up to the PWD_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Within the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES go to forgot password, enter the correct security question answer and continue
teststep.result: - User is presented with option to reset password

teststep.step: Enter new password and enter the same password for re-enter password. Select save changes
teststep.result: - User is logged in

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT is reset to 0

teststep.step: Enter Jeans in search field and click on Search button
teststep.result: - Products related to search criteria are displayed. - Bread crumb is displayed as Search results for:"Jeans"

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage with Name LS_DATA

teststep.step: Verify gnFreeText value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnFreeText value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: \"gnFreeText\":\"<Searched Term>\" E.g. \"gnFreeText\":\"Jeans\"

teststep.step: Click on any product thumbnail
teststep.result: - User is navigated to PDP - Breadcrumb is displayed as {color:red}Search results for: Searched Term e.g. *Search results for: Jeans

teststep.step: Verify gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is not displayed.

teststep.step: Select Regular in Size Range Filter in Left Nav
teststep.result: - Products are filtered as per the selected filter

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage with Name LS_DATA

teststep.step: Verify gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: 1*<Name of Filter><Option Selected> E.g. 1*SIZE_PROPORTION*Regular

teststep.step: Select Long-Sleeve in Sleeve Length Filter in Left Nav
teststep.result: - Products are filtered as per the selected filter

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnRefine value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: 1*<Name of Filter><Option Selected> E.g. 1*SLV_LNGTH*Long-Sleeve

teststep.step: Click on any product thumbnail and verify BreadCrumb
teststep.result: - User is navigated to PDP - Breadcrumb is displayed appended with filters selected in steps 1 and 4 as following: L.L.Bean>Men's>Shirts> Regular Long Sleeve

teststep.step: Select any color chip for the first product and click on on Add to Compare
teststep.result: Product is added to Compare widget

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage with Name LS_DATA

teststep.step: Verify gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: Product1_Page_Number*Product1_Thumbnail_Link$Product1_Color_Chip_Link E.g. 10587*wim/130448_4696_42$130448_4696_43

teststep.step: Select any color chip for the second product and click on on Add to Compare
teststep.result: Product is added to Compare widget

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnCompare value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: Product1_Page_Number*Product1_Thumbnail_Link$Product1_Color_Chip_Link ^Product2_Page_Number * Product2_Thumbnail_Link$Product2_Color_Chip_Link E.g. 10587*wim/130448_4696_42$130448_4696_43^52290*wim/244478_163_42$244478_163_43

teststep.step: Refresh the page and verify display of Compare widget.
teststep.result: - Compare widget is displayed at the bottom right of the page. - Products from Step 1 and 4 are displayed in Compare widget.

teststep.step: Navigate to cookies section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX cookie.
teststep.result: LLBBOX cookie is not present in cookies section of the developer toolbar.

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify the LLBBOX Key Value
teststep.result: LLBBOX Key Value is displayed in following format: Expiry Date in UNIX format;{"CountryCode":"<Value>,"City":"<Value>,"Latitude":"<Value>,"Longitude":"<Value>","ZipCode":"<Value>} E.g. exp@1498143901;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"ALBANY","Latitude":"42.6525","Longitude":"-73.7567","ZipCode":"12201"} NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Verify LLBBOX Value is preceded by Expiry date in UNIX Timestamp format.
teststep.result: Expiry date in UNIX Timestamp format is displayed prefixed to LLBOX value. E.g. exp@1498143901;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"ALBANY","Latitude":"42.6525","Longitude":"-73.7567","ZipCode":"12201"}

teststep.step: Verify LLBBOX expiry date
teststep.result: - LLBBOX expiry date is 1 year from the date it was created.

teststep.step: Navigate to Men's section, then click on Shirts category
teststep.result: Men's Shirt grid page is displayed.

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBGN key.
teststep.result: LLBGN key is present in Local Storage with Name LS_DATA

teststep.step: Select Recommended in Sort by dropdown on the Shirt page. And verify gnSortField value in LS_DATA Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed as Relevance

teststep.step: Select Price (lowest to highest) in Sort by dropdown on the Shirt page. And verify gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed as Price (Ascending)

teststep.step: Select Price (highest to lowest) in Sort by dropdown on the Shirt page. And verify gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed as Price (Descending)

teststep.step: Select Bestselling in Sort by dropdown on the Shirt page. And verify gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed as Num_Of_Orders

teststep.step: Select Newest in Sort by dropdown on the Shirt page. And verify gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed as SRCH_ATTR_RECENCY (Descending)

teststep.step: Select Customer Rating in Sort by dropdown on the Shirt page. And verify gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed as Grade (Descending)

teststep.step: Select A-Z in Sort by dropdown on the Shirt page. And verify gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnSortField value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed as Name (Ascending)

teststep.result: A-Z option is displayed selected in Sort by dropdown.

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify ODS
teststep.result: ODS Value is displayed appended to LLBBOX Key as exp@1498932235;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"RICHMOND","Latitude":"37.5539","ZipCode":"23218","Longitude":"-77.4608", "odsPop":1469988235107} NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Click on Events Near dropdown, select any Location and click outside the dropdown.
teststep.result: Events get filtered as per the location selected in the dropdown.

teststep.result: ODS near events value "odsNear":{"ex":1468594863233,"val":[961]} is displayed appended to the existing value. E.g. {"CountryCode":"USA","City":"ASHBURN","Latitude":"39.0438","ZipCode":"20146","Longitude":"-77.4879", "odsPop":1468594863233, "odsNear":{"ex":1468594863233,"val":[961]} }

teststep.step: Verify ex expiration date of odsNear parameter in the LLBBOX Key Value
teststep.data: Enter first 10 digits of the odsNear ex value in the http://www.unixtimestamp.com/ and click on convert
teststep.result: - odsNear value is a valid UNIX timestamp - UNIX timestamp is one month from the day location was selected in the Events Near dropdow.

teststep.step: Verify val value in the odsNear parameter
teststep.result: - ID of location selected in the Events Near dropdown is displayed against val - Refer link in the test data for the locations and their IDs

teststep.result: - User is able to navigate to other page.

teststep.result: - User is able to navigate to LLBEAN's ODS Page

teststep.result: Location selected in step 3 is displayed below to filters as: Selected: Bloomington, MN

teststep.step: Click the Add button in the My Address information pod
teststep.result: - My Address Information page is displayed - First name is prefilled with the name used to create the account

teststep.step: Add a billing address and click Save Changes
teststep.result: - The Saved Addresses page is displayed. - Address information displays correctly

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Shipping Address Billing Address

teststep.step: Add item to shopping bag, shipping to a recipient and proceed to ORS page
teststep.result: - Correct billing & shipping addresses display on ORS page

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Shipping Address

teststep.step: Click Edit link for Billing Address
teststep.result: - Billing Address page is displayed

teststep.step: Edit Name field and click Save And Continue
teststep.result: - CTA Address Name Change Layer: You changed the name on your billing address. Would you like to save this new address to your account, or use it for this order only?

teststep.step: Select Save to Account
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Billing address displays with updated name

teststep.step: Select Place your order
teststep.result: - Thank you page displays with correct billing & shipping names and addresses

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile
teststep.result: - Billing Address name under My Address Information is updated to name entered in step 5

teststep.step: After https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Shipping Address

teststep.step: Click Edit link for Billing Address
teststep.result: - Billing Address page is displayed

teststep.step: Edit Name field and click Save And Continue
teststep.result: - CTA Address Name Change Layer: You changed the name on your billing address. Would you like to save this new address to your account, or use it for this order only?

teststep.step: Select Save to Account
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Billing address displays with updated name

teststep.step: Select Place your order
teststep.result: - Thank you page displays with correct billing & shipping names and addresses

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile
teststep.result: - Billing Address name under My Address Information is updated to name entered in step 5

teststep.step: After https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Billing Address

execution.components: Create Account,Edit Account,Email,Fraud Prevention,Registered User,Short Form Registered User

teststep.step: Go to My Profile page
teststep.result: - My Address Information pod Instructional text - 'Enter your address now for faster checkouts, access to your full purchase history and more.' Add button - Contact Preferences pod Email selection will be displayed for the Short Form user Catalogs will display instructional test for the Short Form User - 'Add your address to view your catalog preferences.' - Preferred Stores pod Displays the default selections (No Preference)

teststep.step: Click the Add button in the My Address Information pod
teststep.result: - My Address Information page is displayed - Address Name field is not editable - default is My Address Information and is static text - First name field is pre-filled with the first name on the account - Same as my shipping address checkbox is checked.

teststep.step: Complete all required fields and click Save
teststep.result: - User is navigated to Saved Addresses page - Address is saved successfully - User is now a fully registered user - New address is displayed in Saved Address pod and matches what was entered

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Shipping Address Billing Address

teststep.result: - Previously stored credit card information is not retained

execution.components: BASASA,Canada,Checkout,Create Account,Email,Express Register,Fraud Prevention,Guest,Multiple Recipients,Shipping Address,Store Pick-up,Thank You

teststep.step: Select to checkout as Guest
teststep.result: - Taken to Shipping Information page for Canada recipient

teststep.step: Complete all required fields and select Express shipping method
teststep.result: - Able to select Express shipping

teststep.step: Click Next recipient
teststep.result: - Shipping Information page for Me recipient is displayed

teststep.step: Complete all required fields and click Continue to Billing Address
teststep.result: - Billing Address page is displayed

teststep.step: Deselect BASASA, complete all required fields using a valid email address that is https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Email+Address and click Continue to Payment Options
teststep.result: - Payment Options page is displayed

teststep.step: Complete payment options and click Continue to Review Order
teststep.result: - ORS page is displayed: 1 item shipping to buyer's USA Shipping address 1 item shipping to Canada recipient 1 item shipping to store location - Billing Address and My Shipping Address are different US addresses - Ship to Store item displays: FREE Ship to Store and Purchaser must bring valid photo ID at time of pickup

teststep.step: Click Edit link for Store Pick Up item
teststep.result: - User is taken to Shopping Bag page (there is no shipping page for store pick up)

teststep.step: Select to checkout as Guest
teststep.result: - Taken directly to ORS page

teststep.step: Select Place Your Order
teststep.result: - Express Register layer is displayed over Thank You page with the title Save Your Information for Future Orders - Below the message is the email address that will be hour user name and the following fields: Password Re-enter Password Security Questions drop-down list Security Answer No Thanks link Save Your Information button X in top-right corner Background is dimmed

teststep.step: Enter information for all fields and click Save Your Information
teststep.result: - Success layer showing email address replaces Express Register layer

teststep.step: Close Success layer
teststep.result: - Thank You page is displayed: 1 item shipping to buyer's USA Shipping address 1 item shipping to Canada recipient 1 item shipping to store location

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile
teststep.result: - Log in information, Billing Address, Contact info & Shipping Address are the same as entered on the order - Generic Welcome message is updated to Welcome <customer first-name>

teststep.step: Go to Address Book
teststep.result: - My Billing Address and My Shipping Address display - Recipient addresses are added to the account's address book - Ship to Store address is not added to address book

teststep.step: Go to Payment methods
teststep.result: - Credit card info is not stored

teststep.step: Deselect BASASA, complete all required fields using a valid email address that is https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Email+Address and click Continue to Payment Options

teststep.step: Complete payment options and click Continue to Review Order
teststep.result: - ORS page is displayed: 1 item shipping to buyer's USA Shipping address 1 item shipping to Canada recipient 1 item shipping to store location - Billing Address and My Shipping Address are different US addresses - Ship to Store item displays: FREE Ship to Store and Purchaser must bring valid photo ID at time of pickup

teststep.step: Click Edit link for Store Pick Up item
teststep.result: - User is taken to Shopping Bag page (there is no shipping page for store pick up)

teststep.step: Select to checkout as Guest
teststep.result: - Taken directly to ORS page

teststep.step: Select Place Your Order
teststep.result: - Express Register layer is displayed over Thank You page with the title Save Your Information for Future Orders - Below the message is the email address that will be hour user name and the following fields: Password Re-enter Password Security Questions drop-down list Security Answer No Thanks link Save Your Information button X in top-right corner Background is dimmed

teststep.step: Enter information for all fields and click Save Your Information
teststep.result: - Success layer showing email address replaces Express Register layer

teststep.step: Close Success layer
teststep.result: - Thank You page is displayed: 1 item shipping to buyer's USA Shipping address 1 item shipping to Canada recipient 1 item shipping to store location

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile
teststep.result: - Log in information, Billing Address, Contact info & Shipping Address are the same as entered on the order - Generic Welcome message is updated to Welcome <customer first-name>

teststep.step: Go to Address Book
teststep.result: - My Billing Address and My Shipping Address display - Recipient addresses are added to the account's address book - Ship to Store address is not added to address book

teststep.step: Go to Payment methods
teststep.result: - Credit card info is not stored

teststep.result: - Logs show: Beginning of log says "LLBeanChangePasswordCmdImpl" logonAttempt="success" userlogon="email address used " userId="userID associated to email address" timestamp="time of password update" userIP="users IP Address" numAttempts="1"

teststep.step: Enter valid Current password and enter matching passwords for New Password and Re-enter Password, select Update
teststep.result: - Password section collapses and password has been updated

teststep.step: Go to logs (log4j...log): /netlog/was/<environment>
teststep.result: - Logs show: Beginning of log says "LLBeanChangePasswordCmdImpl" logonAttempt="invalidAttempt" userlogon="email address used " userId="userID associated to email address" timestamp="time of password update" userIP="users IP Address" logonAttempt="success" numAttempts="0"

execution.versions: R64 Rapid - Promo Rel type on SB and Checkout

teststep.step: Navigate to Sale product page where Promo Rel Type has been enabled
teststep.data: Two conditions will be used to decide whether or not the Promo rel type has to be rendered for a given item: (1.) no SKU for the item should have a markdown (meaning that none of the SKU's active prices should have precedence=1) and (2.) the page from which the item was added must have an active P0 rel type.
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type does not display on Sale product page

teststep.step: Navigate to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: All items in Shopping Bag display correctly Promo Rel Type does not display for Sale items on Shopping Bag

teststep.step: Navigate to Thank you
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type does not display for sale items on ORS or Thank you page

execution.versions: R64 Rapid - Promo Rel type on SB and Checkout

teststep.step: Navigate to Shopping bag
teststep.data: Two conditions will be used to decide whether or not the Promo rel type has to be rendered for a given item: (1.) no SKU for the item should have a markdown (meaning that none of the SKU's active prices should have precedence=1) and (2.) the page from which the item was added must have an active P0 rel type.
teststep.result: All items in shopping bag display correctly Promo Rel Type displays message: “Note: This item is not eligible for promotional discounts.” for full priced item enabled in PB Promo Rel Type message does not display on any other items in the Shopping bag

teststep.step: Navigate to ORS
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type displays correctly on ORS for enabled full priced item

teststep.step: Check out to Thank you
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type displays correctly on Thank You for enabled full priced item

execution.components: Billing Address,Checkout,Edit Order,Email,Fraud Prevention,Login/Logout,Opt In/Opt Out,Registered User

teststep.result: - Billing Address page is displayed - Messaging is displayed above email fields: *Note:* For your security, changing your email address will delete any saved credit card information from your online account information. teststep.result: - SLAP layer is displayed with options: Close and Continue Leave without Saving

teststep.step: Select Leave without Saving
teststep.result: - Returned to ORS page - Original email address displays below billing address

teststep.step: After https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the original account email address

teststep.step: Click Edit link for Billing Address
teststep.result: - Billing Address page is displayed - Messaging is displayed above email fields: *Note:* For your security, changing your email address will delete any saved credit card information from your online account information. Changing your email address here will also update your login id and the address where you receive emails about your orders and your account. - Prefilled email Address and Re-enter Email Address fields are displayed in an editable state - Opt-in is selected

teststep.step: Edit Email Address & Re-enter Email Address fields, opt out of promotional emails, and click Save And Continue
teststep.result: - Taken to Payment page - No stored credit card information is displayed

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile page, select Edit Email Address
teststep.result: - Opt in is not selected for promotional emails

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile | Email Settings page
teststep.result: - Unsubscribe is selected

teststep.step: Go to My Account | Payment Methods page
teststep.result: - Previously stored credit card has been removed.

teststep.result: - Masked credit card number, credit card brand, and expiration date are displayed

teststep.result: - Stored Credit card information has been retained

teststep.result: - Promotions is not selected under Email Address

teststep.step: Enter email address, and incorrect password
teststep.result: - Error is displayed Either the email address or password you entered is incorrect. Passwords are case sensitive. Please note that if you previously used a user name to log in, you will need to use your email address instead (user names are no longer active on the site).

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT increases by 1

teststep.step: Continue to enter invalid passwords up to the PWD_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT
teststep.result: - Receive error: For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Within the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES, reset account password using CS Password Reset tool (select link in test data column for environment under test)
teststep.result: -Password is Reset

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT is reset to 0

teststep.step: Go back to homepage and enter email address and new password
teststep.result: - User is logged in

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify odsPop paramater and it's value in the LLBBOX Key Value
teststep.result: - odsPop parameter and it's Value are displayed appended to LLBBOX Key as exp@1498932235;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"RICHMOND","Latitude":"37.5539","ZipCode":"23218","Longitude":"-77.4608", "odsPop":1469988235107} NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Verify odsPop value is a valid UNIX timestamp
teststep.data: Enter first 10 digits of the odsPop value in the http://www.unixtimestamp.com/ and click on convert
teststep.result: - odsPop value is a valid UNIX timestamp - UNIX timestamp is one month from the day ODS page was visited.

execution.components: Address Book,Billing Address,Checkout,Edit Account,Edit Order,Email,Fraud Prevention,Login/Logout,ORS,Short Form Registered User,Thank You

teststep.step: Click the Add button in the My Address information pod
teststep.result: - My Address Information page is displayed - First name is prefilled with the name used to create the account

teststep.step: Add a billing address and click Save Changes
teststep.result: - My Profile page is displayed. - Address information displays correctly

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Billing Address Shipping Address

teststep.step: Add item to shopping bag, shipping to a recipient and proceed to ORS page
teststep.result: - Correct billing & shipping addresses display on ORS page

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Shipping Address

teststep.step: Click Edit link for Billing Address
teststep.result: - Billing Address page is displayed

teststep.step: Edit Name field and click Save And Continue
teststep.result: - CTA Address Name Change Layer: You changed the name on your billing address. Would you like to save this new address to your account, or use it for this order only?

teststep.step: Select Save to Account
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Billing address displays with updated name

teststep.step: Select Place your order
teststep.result: - Thank you page displays with correct billing & shipping names and addresses

teststep.step: Go to My Account | Saved Addresses

teststep.step: Wait 5 min and go to SB and select Checkout
teststep.result: - Verification layer displays with links: Forgot your password? not you?

teststep.step: Enter incorrect password
teststep.result: - Error is displayed The password you entered is incorrect. Please note that your password is case sensitive.

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT increases by 1

teststep.step: Continue to enter invalid passwords up to the PWD_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Within the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES enter invalid password in authentication layer
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT does NOT increase

teststep.step: After the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES has passed enter valid password from authentication layer
teststep.result: - user is able to continue to checkout

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT is reset to 0

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT increases by 1

teststep.step: Continue to enter invalid passwords up to the PWD_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been temporarily locked due to incorrect password attempts. Please wait 5 minutes to try again, or reset your password now.

teststep.step: Wait for the PWD_SOFT_LIMIT_TIMEOUT_MINUTES to pass and repeat step 3 for as many times as PWD_INVALID_ABSOLUTE_LIMIT_FACTOR indicates.
teststep.result: - Receive error For your security, your account has been disabled due to incorrect password attempts. Please reset your password online or by calling customer service at 1-888-255-2326..

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/Invalid+Password+Account+Lockout+SQL for account email address
teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT equals PWD_INVALID_ABSOLUTE_LIMIT_FACTOR x PWD_INVALID_SOFT_LIMIT

teststep.result: - Forgot Password layer is displayed with email address pre-filled

teststep.step: Select Continue
teststep.result: - Security Question layer is displayed with text box to enter security question answer

teststep.result: - Change Password layer is displayed with two text boxes for New Password and Re-enter New Password

teststep.step: Enter matching password for New Password and Re-enter New Password and select Save Changes
teststep.result: - User is logged in

teststep.result: - PWD_ATTEMPT_CNT is reset to 0

teststep.step: Quick view a full price item
teststep.data: Add the following parameter to the end of the URL if QV is not displaying add &mmcore.gm=2 (this turns off the maximyser testing
teststep.result: - Free shipping message and ADQ display left aligned in same block below the last attribute or services section - No social media share links display - Add to Wish List displays below Add to Bag button - Correct full price alpha code is displayed for device (LLBEAN.DEVICE_ALPHA_DSPL) - Only full price swatches display

teststep.step: Enter valid 5 digit US zip code in ADQ zone
teststep.result: - Delivery estimate is displayed, format: Day of week, Month Day, Year (Tuesday, August 6, 2014) - Max delivery Date is displayed - City and state are displayed

teststep.step: Select attributes and click Add to Bag
teststep.result: - Able to add to bag - PASB is displayed centered over the page, background page is inactive - Correct product & pricing information is displayed on PASB

teststep.step: Select Checkout on PASB and continue to ORS page
teststep.result: - All Addresses display as entered

teststep.step: Go to a Product Page (do not add Services like Monogramming or Engraving)
teststep.data: run SQL in step 4 on How to test ADQ to determine if item is ADQ eligible
teststep.result: -ADQ area will display Enter zip code for delivery date (Most orders will arrive in 2-5 business days)

teststep.step: Click on Enter zip code link
teststep.result: - Text box is displayed to enter the zip code - Submit button and Cancel link are displayed next to the text box

teststep.step: Enter zip code link and enter a valid US/CAN zip code
teststep.data: i.e. zip code 04011 (Brunswick, Maine). *Note:* Message changes according to the information stored in the data base See scenario #14 in the following document https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=45777164
teststep.result: - User will see the following message Order now and receive by Monday, December 15, 20148 Want it faster? Shipping to Portland, ME. - City and state are displayed below the delivery estimate

teststep.step: Click on the Want it Faster? link
teststep.result: -Selecting the link will evoke the current state pop-over content which contains expedited delivery information

teststep.step: Click on City and State link
teststep.result: - Text box is displayed with the current zip code. - Submit button and Cancel link are displayed next to the text box

teststep.step: Change the zip code for another value US/CAN zipcode
teststep.result: - Delivery date might be updated according to the new zip code added - User is able to add a different zip code

teststep.step: In the Product Page do not add Services like Monogramming or Engraving yet and check the ADQ area
teststep.result: -ADQ area will display Enter zip code for delivery date (Most orders will arrive in 2-5 business days)

teststep.step: Click on Enter zip code link
teststep.result: - Text box is displayed to enter the zip code - Submit button and Cancel link are displayed next to the text box

teststep.step: Enter a US/CAN zip code (if user already has ADQ location displayed from Geo-location, click location to update)
teststep.result: - User will see the following message Order now and receive by Monday, December 15, 20148 Want it faster? Shipping to Portland, ME. - City and state are displayed below the delivery estimate

teststep.step: Select Monogramming or Engraving checkbox
teststep.data: *Note:* See scenario #15 in the following document https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=45777164
teststep.result: - Delivery date is updated to reflect additional time -Message will includes the service name For monogramming (includes monogramming) For Engraving (includes engraving) i.e Order now and receive by Monday, December 15, 20148 (includes monogramming) Want it faster? Shipping to Portland, ME.

teststep.step: Click Buy Another
teststep.result: QuickView opens with background grayed out and cannot interact with page

teststep.step: Select (change) in ADQ zone, enter a different zip code and select Submit
teststep.result: - City and state are displayed - Delivery estimate is displayed

teststep.step: Select Attributes and add to bag
teststep.result: PASB Layer loads

teststep.step: From PASB Layer, click Checkout
teststep.result: Brought to Shopping Bag with correct item

teststep.step: Search for any ODS activity
teststep.data: e.g. Snowshoe, canoeing, kayaking, biking, etc
teststep.result: - Search results page displays Events for and associated products for search term - Quick view and Add to Compare functionality are not available for ODS Events

teststep.step: Click on an Event image that has multiple dates and times available
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Event page - Nothing is prefilled Date, Time and Number of Participants fields are low lit and inactive Start Your Reservation is inactive

teststep.step: Select a location with mulitple dates available
teststep.result: - Event Location displays City and State - Date selection becomes active - Time and Participant dropdowns are still low lit and inactive

teststep.step: Select a date
teststep.result: - Only current and future dates are selectable - Date selected shows in Date field - Helper text displays below the Date drop-down Day of the week, date, year - Time selection becomes active

teststep.step: Select a time
teststep.result: - Selected time displays in drop-down field - Location block displays below the AV images with the specific location for the selected Event occurance - Number of spots available for that occurence displays below the Number of Participants box - Number of Participants becomes active and is defaulted to Select

teststep.step: Select Number of Participants
teststep.result: - Number of participants options are equal to or less than the number of spots available - Number selected displays in drop-down - Start Your Reservation button becomes active

teststep.step: Click Start Your Reservation button
teststep.result: - Reservation Layer opens - Spots are reserved for configured length of time

teststep.step: Select the + Click to view times for the event listed in the calendar that DOES have multiple occurrences on the same day
teststep.result: - Event expands to show all occurrences for that day - The status for each occurrence is displayed

teststep.step: Click the event link for one of the times displayed
teststep.result: - Taken to correct Event page - Order options are prefilled with information for that specific event occurrence - Number of participants is not prefilled - Number of spots remaining displays below Number of Participants - Location map and information displays under the alternate views

teststep.step: Click the Number of Participants dropdown
teststep.result: - Selection displays as 1 through x (number of spots remaining)

teststep.step: Select any number from the Number of Participants dropdown
teststep.result: - Start Your Reservation button becomes active

teststep.step: Click Start Your Reservation button
teststep.result: - Reservation layer opens

teststep.step: Select a paid event from the event calendar
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Event page with all attributes prefilled with the exception of Number of Participants - Breadcrumb = L.L.Bean>Outdoor Discovery Schools><activity> - Event location displays below the alternate views - Number of spots available displays below the participant drop-down - Alternate view images display centered - What to bring list displays below alternate view images

teststep.step: Fill in all information on the Event page and click Start Your Reservation
teststep.result: - Reservation layer displays

teststep.step: Select a free event from the event calendar
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Reservation layer for the free event selected

teststep.step: Deselect email promote checkbox and proceed to Payment page. Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/CASL+Queries query
teststep.result: - AFT_EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = N - CNTRY_ID = USA - CNTRY_SRC_CD = U - PROMO_CNSNT_TYP_CD = E

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile | Email Address
teststep.result: - Email promote checkbox is deselected

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 for email address
teststep.result: - EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = N

execution.components: Create Account,Login/Logout,Opt In/Opt Out,Short Form Registered User

teststep.step: Select Create an account button
teststep.result: - Create Account layer displays First name Email address, Re-enter Email Address Password, Re-enter Password Security Question, Security Answer Email (opt in) Updates is selected by default - CHTML Block at the top of the layer displays - Verisign Logo displays near the CHTML block

teststep.step: Enter valid text Fields and Click 'CREATE MY ACCOUNT'
teststep.result: - Confirmation dialog displays Congratulations, an llbean.com account has been successfully created for <Email address>* - Account successfully created

teststep.step: Click on Close and Continue
teststep.result: - Brought to My Account main Page - Log in link from Header changes to Welcome, <firstname from llbwelcome cookie> - LLBWELCOME cookie is created with info from DB

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/CASL+Queries in mainframe DB
teststep.result: - CASL data points are stored - Country Code: Country the account was created from - Country Source: Source of country code (I = IP Address) - Consent Type: I (Explicit or Implicit) since the user did not interact with the email updates flag

teststep.step: Log out
teststep.result: - User is logged out successfully - User will be redirected to Home page

teststep.step: Log in again using the new account
teststep.result: - Log in layer is pre-filled with user's email address - User can log in successfully - Welcome message is updated correctly - Log in link changes to Welcome, firstname link - LLBWELCOME cookie is created with First Name on account and same expiration date as the WC_PERSISTENT cookie

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile page, select Edit Email Address
teststep.result: - Opt in is selected for promotional emails

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile | Email Settings page
teststep.result: - Subscribe is selected

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 against ecom database
teststep.result: - No records are returned

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 on mainframe
teststep.result: - EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = Y

teststep.step: Select email promote checkbox and proceed to Payment page. Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/CASL+Queries query
teststep.result: - AAFT_EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = Y - CNTRY_ID = (abbreviation of country entered for BA) ex. CAN - CNTRY_SRC_CD = U - PROMO_CNSNT_TYP_CD = E

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile | Email Address
teststep.result: - Email promote checkbox is selected

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 for email address
teststep.result: - EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = Y

teststep.step: Add a billing address and click Save Changes
teststep.result: - My Profile page is displayed. - Address information displays correctly

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Billing Address Shipping Address

teststep.step: Add item to shopping bag, shipping to a recipient and proceed to ORS page
teststep.result: - Correct billing & shipping addresses display on ORS page

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Shipping Address

teststep.step: Click Edit link for Billing Address
teststep.result: - Billing Address page is displayed

teststep.step: Edit Name field and click Save And Continue
teststep.result: - CTA Address Name Change Layer: You changed the name on your billing address. Would you like to save this new address to your account, or use it for this order only?

teststep.step: Select Save to Account
teststep.result: - Taken to ORS page - Billing address displays with updated name

teststep.step: Select Place your order
teststep.result: - Thank you page displays with correct billing & shipping names and addresses

teststep.step: Go to My Account | Saved Addresses
teststep.result: My Billing Address name is updated to name entered in step 5

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Billing Address

execution.components: Create Account,Edit Account,Email,Fraud Prevention,Registered User,Short Form Registered User

teststep.step: Go to My Profile page
teststep.result: - My Address Information Instructional text - 'Enter your address here to be able to access purchase history.' - Contact Settings Email Frequency displays 'Send Newsletters, Sales and Promotions - Preferred Stores Displays the default selections 'Select'

teststep.step: Click the Add CTA '>' in My Address Information
teststep.result: - My Address Information page is displayed - Address Name field is not editable - default is My Address Information and is static text - First name field is pre-filled with the first name on the account - Same as my shipping address checkbox is checked.

teststep.step: Complete all required fields and click Save
teststep.result: - User is navigated to My Profile page - Address is saved successfully - User is now a fully registered user - New address is displayed in the My Address Information pod and matches what was entered

teststep.step: Wait https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has been received - Updated: shows Billing Address Shipping Address

teststep.step: Go to the account Security Question
teststep.result: - Security Question field displays with account Security Question - Security Answer field is blank (empty) - Password field displays with instructional text: Please enter your password to confirm your update.

teststep.step: Select option Please Select: in Security Question dropdown
teststep.result: - Unable to select Please Select: option

teststep.step: Select a new Security Question, enter a security answer
teststep.result: - Security Answer is displayed as entered (unmasked)

teststep.step: Enter an invalid password and select Update
teststep.result: - Inline field validation message displays: The Password you entered does not match the password we have on record. Please try again. - The password field is cleared

teststep.step: Query the ecom database
teststep.result: - Challenge Question in database matches account Security Question - Challenge Answer in database matches Security Answer for account Security Question

teststep.step: After https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Batch+Job+Configuration time for email notifications, Log in to the email client (NOT account on L.L.Bean site) for the account email address
teststep.result: - Your Account Information Has Been Updated https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NOTIFICATIONS/Customer+Security+Improvements+Requirements?preview=/75956696/84443929/S16_0601_EMAILChangeNotification_Final.jpg has not been received

teststep.step: Select the link that says "Make this my default shipping address" for one of the addresses
teststep.result: - Selected address is now default address and displays address message Default Shipping Address - Original default SA displays Make this my default shipping address

teststep.result: - In drop down list next to Ship to the recipient nickname is displayed

teststep.result: - Able to add to bag - PASB is displayed centered over the page, background page is inactive - Correct product & pricing information is displayed on PASB

teststep.result: - All Addresses display as entered

teststep.result: -Selecting the link will evoke the current state pop-over content which contains expedited delivery information

teststep.result: - Delivery date might be updated according to the new zip code added - User is able to add a different zip code

teststep.result: - Text box is displayed to enter the zip code - Submit button and Cancel link are displayed next to the text box

Shipping to Portland, ME.

teststep.step: Click on an Event image that has multiple dates and times available

teststep.result: - Selected time displays in drop-down field - Location block displays below the AV images with the specific location for the selected Event occurance - Number of spots available for that occurence displays below the Number of Participants box - Number of Participants becomes active and is defaulted to Select

execution.versions: R64 Rapid - Promo Rel type on SB and Checkout

teststep.step: Navigate to Shopping bag
teststep.data: Two conditions will be used to decide whether or not the Promo rel type has to be rendered for a given item: (1.) no SKU for the item should have a markdown (meaning that none of the SKU's active prices should have precedence=1) and (2.) the page from which the item was added must have an active P0 rel type.
teststep.result: All items in shopping bag display correctly Promo Rel Type displays message: “Note: This item is not eligible for promotional discounts.” for full priced item enabled in PB Promo Rel Type message does not display on any other items in the Shopping bag

teststep.step: Navigate to ORS
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type displays correctly on ORS for enabled full priced item

teststep.step: Check out to Thank you
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type displays correctly on Thank You for enabled full priced item

execution.versions: R64 Rapid - Promo Rel type on SB and Checkout

teststep.step: Navigate to Sale product page where Promo Rel Type has been enabled
teststep.data: Two conditions will be used to decide whether or not the Promo rel type has to be rendered for a given item: (1.) no SKU for the item should have a markdown (meaning that none of the SKU's active prices should have precedence=1) and (2.) the page from which the item was added must have an active P0 rel type.
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type does not display on Sale product page

teststep.step: Navigate to Shopping Bag
teststep.result: All items in Shopping Bag display correctly Promo Rel Type does not display for Sale items on Shopping Bag

teststep.step: Navigate to Thank you
teststep.result: Promo Rel Type does not display for sale items on ORS or Thank you page

teststep.step: Verify gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: ^Category_Page_ID*Category_Name^Sub_Category_Page_ID*Sub_Category_Name E.g. ^26*Men's^589*Shirts

teststep.step: Click on any Sub category under Shirts in left nav
teststep.result: - Results are filtered according to the sub-category selected - Breadcrumb is displayed as L.L.Bean>Men's>Shirts>Button-Down

teststep.step: Verify gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: ^Category_Page_ID*Category_Name^Sub1_Category_Page_ID*Sub1_Category_Name^Sub2_Category_Page_ID*Sub2_Category_Name E.g. ^26*Men's^589*Shirts^504190*Button-Down

teststep.step: Click on any product thumbnail
teststep.result: - User is navigated to PDP - Breadcrumb is displayed as L.L.Bean>Men's>Shirts>Button-Down

teststep.step: Verify gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage
teststep.result: gnBreadcrumb value in LLBGN Key in Local Storage is displayed in following format: ^Category_Page_ID*Category_Name^Sub1_Category_Page_ID*Sub1_Category_Name^Sub2_Category_Page_ID*Sub2_Category_Name E.g. ^26*Men's^589*Shirts^504190*Button-Down

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify the CountryCode parameter value in LLBBOX Key
teststep.result: CountryCode value is displayed as USA: E.g. exp@1498677349;{ "CountryCode":"USA" ,"City":"ASHBURN","Latitude":"39.0438","ZipCode":"20146","Longitude":"-77.4879"} NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Click on CREATE AN ACCOUNT button on log-in pop-in
teststep.result: - Create an Account pop-in is displayed

teststep.step: Verify Email Opt-in checkbox
teststep.result: Email Opt-in checkbox is displayed Checked as CountryCode in step 2 is USA

teststep.step: Change user IP ADDRESS to France (Use MODIFY HEADERS to change the ip-address), clear cookies and website data, open LLBEAN.COM.
teststep.result: - LLBEAN.COM homepage is displayed.

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify the CountryCode parameter value in LLBBOX Key
teststep.result: CountryCode value is displayed as FRA: E.g. exp@1498680515;{ "CountryCode":"FRA" ,"City":"PARIS","Latitude":"48.87","Longitude":"2.33"} NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Click on log-in link in the header.
teststep.result: - Log-in pop-in is displayed.

teststep.step: Click on CREATE AN ACCOUNT button on log-in pop-in
teststep.result: Create an Account pop-in is displayed

teststep.step: Verify Email Opt-in checkbox
teststep.result: Email Opt-in checkbox is displayed Unchecked as CountryCode in step 7 is FRA (FRANCE)

teststep.step: Click on Petite option.
teststep.result: - Petite option is displayed selected.

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify the LLBBOX Key Value
teststep.result: LLBBOX Key Value is displayed appended with selected option in step 1 as exp@1498677349;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"ASHBURN","Latitude":"39.0438","ZipCode":"20146","Longitude":"-77.4879","prefItem": {"27":"Misses'"} } NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Navigate to Local Storage section in the developer toolbar and search for LLBBOX key.
teststep.result: LLBBOX key is present in Local Storage

teststep.step: Verify odsPop paramater and it's value in the LLBBOX Key Value
teststep.result: - odsPop parameter and it's Value are displayed appended to LLBBOX Key as exp@1498932235;{"CountryCode":"USA","City":"RICHMOND","Latitude":"37.5539","ZipCode":"23218","Longitude":"-77.4608", "odsPop":1469988235107} NOTE: LLBBOX Value is displayed as per the IP address of the user.

teststep.step: Verify odsPop value is a valid UNIX timestamp
teststep.data: Enter first 10 digits of the odsPop value in the http://www.unixtimestamp.com/ and click on convert
teststep.result: - odsPop value is a valid UNIX timestamp - UNIX timestamp is one month from the day ODS page was visited.
