teststep.step: Quick view a full price item
teststep.data: Add the following parameter to the end of the URL if QV is not displaying add &mmcore.gm=2 (this turns off the maximyser testing
teststep.result: - Free shipping message and ADQ display left aligned in same block below the last attribute or services section - No social media share links display - Add to Wish List displays below Add to Bag button - Correct full price alpha code is displayed for device (LLBEAN.DEVICE_ALPHA_DSPL) - Only full price swatches display

teststep.step: Enter valid 5 digit US zip code in ADQ zone
teststep.result: - Delivery estimate is displayed, format: Day of week, Month Day, Year (Tuesday, August 6, 2014) - Max delivery Date is displayed - City and state are displayed

teststep.step: Select attributes and click Add to Bag
teststep.result: - Able to add to bag - PASB is displayed centered over the page, background page is inactive - Correct product & pricing information is displayed on PASB

teststep.step: Select Checkout on PASB and continue to ORS page
teststep.result: - All Addresses display as entered

teststep.step: Go to a Product Page (do not add Services like Monogramming or Engraving)
teststep.data: run SQL in step 4 on How to test ADQ to determine if item is ADQ eligible
teststep.result: -ADQ area will display Enter zip code for delivery date (Most orders will arrive in 2-5 business days)

teststep.step: Click on Enter zip code link
teststep.result: - Text box is displayed to enter the zip code - Submit button and Cancel link are displayed next to the text box

teststep.step: Enter zip code link and enter a valid US/CAN zip code
teststep.data: i.e. zip code 04011 (Brunswick, Maine). *Note:* Message changes according to the information stored in the data base See scenario #14 in the following document https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=45777164
teststep.result: - User will see the following message Order now and receive by Monday, December 15, 20148 Want it faster? Shipping to Portland, ME. - City and state are displayed below the delivery estimate

teststep.step: Click on the Want it Faster? link
teststep.result: -Selecting the link will evoke the current state pop-over content which contains expedited delivery information

teststep.step: Click on City and State link
teststep.result: - Text box is displayed with the current zip code. - Submit button and Cancel link are displayed next to the text box

teststep.step: Change the zip code for another value US/CAN zipcode
teststep.result: - Delivery date might be updated according to the new zip code added - User is able to add a different zip code

teststep.step: In the Product Page do not add Services like Monogramming or Engraving yet and check the ADQ area
teststep.result: -ADQ area will display Enter zip code for delivery date (Most orders will arrive in 2-5 business days)

teststep.step: Click on Enter zip code link
teststep.result: - Text box is displayed to enter the zip code - Submit button and Cancel link are displayed next to the text box

teststep.step: Enter a US/CAN zip code (if user already has ADQ location displayed from Geo-location, click location to update)
teststep.result: - User will see the following message Order now and receive by Monday, December 15, 20148 Want it faster? Shipping to Portland, ME. - City and state are displayed below the delivery estimate

teststep.step: Select Monogramming or Engraving checkbox
teststep.data: *Note:* See scenario #15 in the following document https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=45777164
teststep.result: - Delivery date is updated to reflect additional time -Message will includes the service name For monogramming (includes monogramming) For Engraving (includes engraving) i.e Order now and receive by Monday, December 15, 20148 (includes monogramming) Want it faster? Shipping to Portland, ME.

teststep.step: Click Buy Another
teststep.result: QuickView opens with background grayed out and cannot interact with page

teststep.step: Select (change) in ADQ zone, enter a different zip code and select Submit
teststep.result: - City and state are displayed - Delivery estimate is displayed

teststep.step: Select Attributes and add to bag
teststep.result: PASB Layer loads

teststep.step: From PASB Layer, click Checkout
teststep.result: Brought to Shopping Bag with correct item

teststep.step: Search for any ODS activity
teststep.data: e.g. Snowshoe, canoeing, kayaking, biking, etc
teststep.result: - Search results page displays Events for and associated products for search term - Quick view and Add to Compare functionality are not available for ODS Events

teststep.step: Click on an Event image that has multiple dates and times available
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Event page - Nothing is prefilled Date, Time and Number of Participants fields are low lit and inactive Start Your Reservation is inactive

teststep.step: Select a location with mulitple dates available
teststep.result: - Event Location displays City and State - Date selection becomes active - Time and Participant dropdowns are still low lit and inactive

teststep.step: Select a date
teststep.result: - Only current and future dates are selectable - Date selected shows in Date field - Helper text displays below the Date drop-down Day of the week, date, year - Time selection becomes active

teststep.step: Select a time
teststep.result: - Selected time displays in drop-down field - Location block displays below the AV images with the specific location for the selected Event occurance - Number of spots available for that occurence displays below the Number of Participants box - Number of Participants becomes active and is defaulted to Select

teststep.step: Select Number of Participants
teststep.result: - Number of participants options are equal to or less than the number of spots available - Number selected displays in drop-down - Start Your Reservation button becomes active

teststep.step: Click Start Your Reservation button
teststep.result: - Reservation Layer opens - Spots are reserved for configured length of time

teststep.step: Select the + Click to view times for the event listed in the calendar that DOES have multiple occurrences on the same day
teststep.result: - Event expands to show all occurrences for that day - The status for each occurrence is displayed

teststep.step: Click the event link for one of the times displayed
teststep.result: - Taken to correct Event page - Order options are prefilled with information for that specific event occurrence - Number of participants is not prefilled - Number of spots remaining displays below Number of Participants - Location map and information displays under the alternate views

teststep.step: Click the Number of Participants dropdown
teststep.result: - Selection displays as 1 through x (number of spots remaining)

teststep.step: Select any number from the Number of Participants dropdown
teststep.result: - Start Your Reservation button becomes active

teststep.step: Click Start Your Reservation button
teststep.result: - Reservation layer opens

teststep.step: Select a paid event from the event calendar
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Event page with all attributes prefilled with the exception of Number of Participants - Breadcrumb = L.L.Bean>Outdoor Discovery Schools><activity> - Event location displays below the alternate views - Number of spots available displays below the participant drop-down - Alternate view images display centered - What to bring list displays below alternate view images

teststep.step: Fill in all information on the Event page and click Start Your Reservation
teststep.result: - Reservation layer displays

teststep.step: Select a free event from the event calendar
teststep.result: - Taken to the correct Reservation layer for the free event selected

teststep.step: Deselect email promote checkbox and proceed to Payment page. Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/CASL+Queries query
teststep.result: - AFT_EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = N - CNTRY_ID = USA - CNTRY_SRC_CD = U - PROMO_CNSNT_TYP_CD = E

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile | Email Address
teststep.result: - Email promote checkbox is deselected

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 for email address
teststep.result: - EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = N

execution.components: Create Account,Login/Logout,Opt In/Opt Out,Short Form Registered User

teststep.step: Select Create an account button
teststep.result: - Create Account layer displays First name Email address, Re-enter Email Address Password, Re-enter Password Security Question, Security Answer Email (opt in) Updates is selected by default - CHTML Block at the top of the layer displays - Verisign Logo displays near the CHTML block

teststep.step: Enter valid text Fields and Click 'CREATE MY ACCOUNT'
teststep.result: - Confirmation dialog displays Congratulations, an llbean.com account has been successfully created for <Email address>* - Account successfully created

teststep.step: Click on Close and Continue
teststep.result: - Brought to My Account main Page - Log in link from Header changes to Welcome, <firstname from llbwelcome cookie> - LLBWELCOME cookie is created with info from DB

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/CASL+Queries in mainframe DB
teststep.result: - CASL data points are stored - Country Code: Country the account was created from - Country Source: Source of country code (I = IP Address) - Consent Type: I (Explicit or Implicit) since the user did not interact with the email updates flag

teststep.step: Log out
teststep.result: - User is logged out successfully - User will be redirected to Home page

teststep.step: Log in again using the new account
teststep.result: - Log in layer is pre-filled with user's email address - User can log in successfully - Welcome message is updated correctly - Log in link changes to Welcome, firstname link - LLBWELCOME cookie is created with First Name on account and same expiration date as the WC_PERSISTENT cookie

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile page, select Edit Email Address
teststep.result: - Opt in is selected for promotional emails

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile | Email Settings page
teststep.result: - Subscribe is selected

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 against ecom database
teststep.result: - No records are returned

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 on mainframe
teststep.result: - EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = Y

teststep.step: Select email promote checkbox and proceed to Payment page. Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/display/CTQ/CASL+Queries query
teststep.result: - AAFT_EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = Y - CNTRY_ID = (abbreviation of country entered for BA) ex. CAN - CNTRY_SRC_CD = U - PROMO_CNSNT_TYP_CD = E

teststep.step: Go to My Account | My Profile | Email Address
teststep.result: - Email promote checkbox is selected

teststep.step: Run https://llbean.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=70484014 for email address
teststep.result: - EMAIL_PROMO_FLG = Y
